data.message:
Greetings from Shine Uganda Orphanage
Write a Christmas card and send it out to the children at Shine Uganda Orphanage in Uganda, East -Africa.
These children are orphans and so they only depend on friends and partners like you to share the joy of Christmas and the festive season.
We have 116 children and we desire that each of them receives a Christmas card and a gift.
As this year ends you can join us here at Shine Uganda Ministries to support these little ones.
Here is our address:

Shine Uganda Orphanage
P.O Box 36442
Kampala – Uganda
East-Africa

Please include your gift of ten dollars ($10) or more as your contribution to the children’s Christmas party here.
Please write your name and address on the card because the children would love to write back to you and thank you. You may also include your photo or your family photo.
Find the names of the children at our website http://shineugandaministries.com/sponsor.php
Thank you
